about_the_game:
This is a cooperative first-person psychological horror game. You are a test subject in a series of inhuman experiments conducted by an unknown organization. How much time have you already spent in this cold cell? Perhaps the moment has come to break out of captivity, overcome your fears and escape from this horror. Open the door to the unknown, join forces with your fellow prisoners and together try to find a way out of this nightmare. Only you are able to regain your freedom and put an end to these crazy experiments.



Explore the mysteries of the abandoned laboratory with your friends.



Your task is to get out of this creepy place, taking advantage of all possible resources, using limited ammunition.

Game Features:

-Collaborative online play for 2-4 players
-Voice chat
-Walking simulator
-High quality sounds
-Realistic graphics
